page.title: 16 AN 8 YEAR OLD'S DAY
page.content: For my Maths yesterday we did measuring in metres and centimetres.I like doing that kind of Maths.At 12 o'clock we have lunch.I stay for packed lunches.For my packed lunch today I had sandwiches,an apple and a chocolate biscuit.After lunch we have a long playtime.Amy and I carry on playing horses or snakes and dragons.We do art after play.I have done a writing pattern on the sheet with which we are going to make a teepee.Just before the Infants go home we have a story.At 20 past 3 we do our Maths or Grammar.At 10 to 4 the Juniors go home. After school I play with Amy.I also take Rozzilind my dog for a walk.At night I read a book and then I go to sleep at 9 o ' clock.
